title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2021
text: I take this product to prevent a reoccurrence of kidney stones.  Thank God, I haven't had any more kidney stones since I have been taking this product.

title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2018
text: Having had two extremely scary episodes with Kidney Stones over the past years - I decided to combat them by drinking a lot of water with organic LIME juice added, plus I take 2 of these AM and 2 more PM every day.  Since adding these supplements to the water with lime juice, I have not experienced a recurrance of the Kidney Stones.

title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2017
text: I've taken potassium supplements for years for kidney stones and horrible foot cramps. I take a couple of these every day and no problems. It's something I can't be without and for the price and quality this product is great.

title: 5.0 out of 5 stars

text: great price, delivered quickly. had a kidney stone - never again, this supplement was recommended - so far so good

title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
date: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2013
text: Got a uric acid kidney stone that got stuck in my uterer and required a stent be inserted.  After doing so online research, I used the potassium citrate to help with dissolving the stone and it worked (along with a lot of fluids every day for 3 months).  The urologist insisted that the stone was still there, but when they pulled the stent, it was gone.
